title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's 1791066 Stainless Steel Watch With Brown Leather Band
feature: Round watch featuring logoed blue dial with luminous hands/Arabic indices and three chronograph subdials
46 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Genuine leather band with buckle closure

Only purchases from an authorized retailer of Tommy Hilfiger Watches are covered by the manufacturer’s warranty. Amazon is currently the only authorized dealer of Tommy Hilfiger Watches on the Amazon.com site.
description: Stainless steel case with a brown leather strap. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Blue dial with silver-toned hands and Arabic hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Three multi-functiom sub-dials displaying: day of the week, date and 24 hour. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Solid case back. Case diameter: 46 mm. Case thickness: 14 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 22 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Tommy Hilfiger Blue Dial Brown Leather Mens Watch 1791066.
